help-file.title: INNATE
help-file.content: Typing "innate", gives you a list of your race's or classes' innate abilities, if any. Innate abilities are those skills or spells which all members of your race or class know instinctively. To use an innate ability, use the proper syntax for the given skill or spell. To get more information on a particular skill or spell, type "help <skill>" or "help <spell>," respectively. The innate abilities for each race or class are listed under their help entry.
